OptionChoice.name: enableGeoStrata
OptionChoice.Description: Should Custom Ore Generation handle GeoStrata ore generation?

Choice.description: Use Custom Ore Generation to handle GeoStrata ores.
GeoStrata ores will be handled by the mod itself.

OptionChoice.name: cleanUpGeoStrata
OptionChoice.Description: Should Custom Ore Generation use the Substitution Pass to remove all instances of GeoStrata ore from the world? If the mod's oregen can be turned off in its configuration, then it's recommended to do so, as the substitution pass can slow the game significantly. If this option is disabled without disabling the mod's own ore generation, you'll end up with two oregens working at once, flooding the world with ore. Enabled by default to ensure the ores are completely removed.

Choice.description: Use the substitution pass to clean up GeoStrata ores.
GeoStrata ores do not need to be cleaned up by a substitution pass.

Choice.Description: Wide, thin, and flat disks of ore.
Small, fairly rare motherlodes with 2-4 horizontal veins each.
Simulates Vanilla Minecraft.

Choice.description: Shale is not generated in the world.

OptionNumeric.name: gstaShaleFreq
OptionNumeric.Description: Frequency multiplier for GeoStrata Shale distributions

OptionNumeric.name: gstaShaleSize
OptionNumeric.Description: Size multiplier for GeoStrata Shale distributions

OptionChoice.name: gstaMountainShaleDist
OptionChoice.Description: Controls how Mountain Shale is generated

Substitute.name: gstaOverworldBlockSubstitute0
Substitute.Comment: The global option deferredPopulationRange must be large enough to catch all ore clusters (>= 32).

Cloud.name: gstaShaleCloud
Cloud.Description: Wide, thin, and flat disks of ore. Primarily, this distribution is meant to provide realistic distribution of stone in a strata formation.

Veins.name: gstaShaleVeins
Veins.Description: Small, fairly rare motherlodes with 2-4 horizontal veins each.

StandardGen.name: gstaShaleStandard
StandardGen.Description: A master preset for standardgen ore distributions.
